title: France Covered Up Torture and Mutilation of Bataclan Victims
subtitle: After the Bastille Day attack in Nice, news outlets rehashed debunked claims that France actively covered up horrifying details of torture at the Bataclan in November 2015 attacks.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: France deliberately suppressed information about torture and mutilation at the Bataclan in November 2015 to avoid upsetting Muslims.
